description: Change events including object creation, deletion, modification, and access control changes

constraints.search: (`cim_Change_indexes`) tag=change NOT (object_category=file OR object_category=directory OR object_category=registry)

fields.name: _time
fields.description: The time of the event

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host that generated the event

fields.name: source
fields.description: The source of the event

fields.name: sourcetype
fields.description: The sourcetype of the event

fields.name: action
fields.description: The action performed on the resource

fields.name: change_type
fields.description: The type of change performed

fields.name: command
fields.description: The command that was executed

fields.name: dest
fields.description: The destination system where the change occurred

fields.name: dvc
fields.description: The device where the change occurred

fields.name: object
fields.description: The object that was changed

fields.name: object_attrs
fields.description: The attributes of the object that were changed

fields.name: object_category
fields.description: The category of the object that was changed

fields.name: object_id
fields.description: The ID of the object that was changed

fields.name: object_path
fields.description: The path of the object that was changed

fields.name: result
fields.description: The result of the change

fields.name: src
fields.description: The source of the change request

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the change

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user that performed the change

fields.name: vendor_product
fields.description: The vendor and product that generated the event

fields.name: tag
fields.description: The tags associated with the event
